content: Thunderbird needs your password to access the account for you. You are the only one to provide it. Try contacting your email provider.
creator: davidsk

content: Wellicht kan dit artikel u verder helpen: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/kan-geen-berichten-verzenden. Hoe Thunderbird moet worden ingesteld specifiek voor Freedom wordt hier uitgelegd: https://helpdesk.freedom.nl/category-detail/hoe-stel-je-thunderbird-in-voor-je-e-mailaccount-op-je-laptop-of-computer.
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content: Voordat we een analyse uitvoeren, kijk eerst eens op deze pagina: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/kan-geen-berichten-verzenden voor mogelijke oplossingen.
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content: Lees dit artikel door voor mogelijke oplossingen, zoals comprimeren en/of repareren: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/mappen-comprimeren-mogelijke-complicaties. Mocht dat niet werken, sluit Thunderbird dan af en verwijder in Verkenner het .msf-bestand dat bij de betreffende map hoort. Dit staat in het Thunderbird-profiel Thunderbird-profiel.
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content:
Hello there


To see if the password is available :

Pour voir si le mot de passe est disponible :

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/password-manager-remember-delete-change-tb
creator: Googlethunderbird

content:
• Start Windows in safe mode with networking enabled - https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12376/windows-10-start-your-pc-in-safe-mode
  • Still In Windows safe mode, start Thunderbird in Troubleshoot Mode - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Does problem change?
creator: wsmwk

content:
Hello there Jane .


Yes it could be complicated as user. About the all mail folder , yes it is the archive folder in more email programs. But you can delete the complete folder if it is that wish for it.

Open Thunderbird , go to the View menu and select Folders. And use the settings.
creator: Googlethunderbird

content: I am using the Daily version an all I need to do is click to edit the mailing list, and then enter first few letters of a name and all email addresses for the individual appear, eligible to be added to addressbook.
creator: davidsk

content: Yup, I've done that, and it initially appears to work (the newly-added address appears in the list). But after clicking the OK button to end the editing of the list, then again editing the list to verify the change, the newly-added address isn't there, only the default address.
creator: cetownegm
